flavor: Run wyld.
printed_text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.

flavor: They can buy off union leadership, but they can't stop us walking out!
printed_text:
Resolve 1 of the following of the Corp's choice:
  • Gain 6[credit].
  • Draw 4 cards.
stripped_printed_text: Resolve 1 of the following of the Corp's choice: * Gain 6 credits. * Draw 4 cards.

flavor:
"It hungers to sink teeth into problems."
—Loup
printed_text: +1[mu] Access → Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Access -> Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: Was it something you ate?
printed_text: Install only on a piece of ice. When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.
stripped_printed_text: Install only on a piece of ice. When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.

flavor: Destruction is an art.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 3[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 code gate subroutines. 3 credits: +1 strength.

flavor: Subtlety is a luxury.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break up to 2 barrier subroutines. 2 credits: +1 strength.

flavor:
"There's a tension to a cook. Each processing cycle sweetens the pot and raises the heat. I stir all night, but few have my appetite for danger."
—René "Loup" Arcemont
printed_text:
When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
[click], [trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each hosted virus counter.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. click, trash: Gain 2 credits for each hosted virus counter.

flavor: The greediest bloodsucker this side of a corporate boardroom.
printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter.

flavor:
"It waits on an unlabelled memstrip far below the deepest hab. Angry, desperate souls seek it out, hungry for power to change a brutal world. Once they can stomach no more bitter revenge, they return to that nameless tunnel, the book a recipe thicker."
—Heinlein urban legend
printed_text: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.

flavor: I obtain your desire.
printed_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1 credit for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: The real reward is the friends you make along the way.
printed_text: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker program and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install it. If you do not, add it to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker program and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install it. If you do not, add it to your grip.

flavor:
"A mirrorfiber mod or high-end mantle can be helpful, but nothing beats a good dose of 'keeping your damn head down.'"
—"G0ph3r" O'Ryan
printed_text: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3 credits.

flavor: Zahya knows the keeper of every door between the Docklands and the Domes. More importantly, she knows their price.
printed_text: The first time each turn you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.

flavor: "Braggarts chase big heists. Patience enriches skimming fractions of a credit at a time." —Zahya
printed_text: +1[mu] Whenever you make a successful run, place 1[credit] on this hardware. [click]: Place 1[credit] on this hardware, then take all credits from it. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 credit on this hardware. click: Place 1 credit on this hardware, then take all credits from it. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor:
The whole wide world your domain
For law your own free will.
printed_text: If you made a successful run this turn, this program costs 2[credit] less to install. Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2[credit]: +3 strength.
stripped_printed_text: If you made a successful run this turn, this program costs 2 credits less to install. Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 2 credits: +3 strength.

flavor:
"You can't rule a kingdom by standing still."
—Zahya Sadeghi
printed_text: Interface → 2[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you made a successful run this turn, this ability costs 1[credit] less to use. 1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 2 credits: Break 1 barrier subroutine. If you made a successful run this turn, this ability costs 1 credit less to use. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: Shhhh. It's naptime.
printed_text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.
stripped_printed_text: Install only on a piece of ice. When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.

flavor: The Domes of Heinlein are a pressure cooker of cutthroat capitalism. Prospective employers rarely have time for background checks.
printed_text:
When you install this resource, load 12[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
[click]: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3[credit] from this resource.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this resource, load 12 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3 credits from this resource.

flavor: Sufficient skill is indistinguishable from magic.
printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.

flavor: The challenge of my art is what I live for, but I'm not going to say no to a patron with taste.
printed_text: Gain 5[credit]. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
stripped_printed_text: Gain 5 credits. If you have any click remaining, lose click.

flavor:
"You know there's no water in the Sea of Tranquility, right?"
"That doesn't mean there's no beach."
printed_text: Draw 4 cards. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
stripped_printed_text: Draw 4 cards. If you have any click remaining, lose click.

flavor: Tāo exhaled, the med-exoskeleton faithfully stabilizing him. In that absent breath, he reached through layers of waldos and optimizers and plucked the errant molecule from the chip.
printed_text:
+1[mu]
The first program you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu The first program you install each turn costs 1 credit less to install.

flavor:
"With this beautiful baby I can juggle simultaneous runs by haptic feedback alone!"
—Tāo
printed_text: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1[credit]. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1 credit. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor:
A dabbling with truth is a pernicious dream
Drink deep, or taste not the raw datastream.
printed_text:
Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program.
[click]: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. click: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.

flavor: The beauty of open projects—each stands atop past success.
printed_text: This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker (including this one). Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3[credit]: +2 strength.
stripped_printed_text: This program gets +1 strength for each installed icebreaker (including this one). Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 sentry subroutine. 3 credits: +2 strength.

flavor: The joy of handcrafted code—each fits perfectly within the whole.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1[credit]: +1 strength for each installed icebreaker (including this one).
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 1 credit: +1 strength for each installed icebreaker (including this one).

flavor:
"For all I know, I could spend a shift digging next to old Weyland himself."
—Lane

When you install this resource, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
[click]: Take 3[credit] from this resource. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: When you install this resource, load 9 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Take 3 credits from this resource. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor:
"We'll take the access codes from their own prisec—privilege escalation through local application of force."
—The Catalyst
printed_text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card and when you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
stripped_printed_text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card and when you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.

flavor: "After 381FS4 started acting independently, all bets were off. Rethreading its own brain chip... even probing our nodes. I had to shut it down." —Linus Lovegood, NBN Novelties&Acquisitions
printed_text: Place 5[credit] on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
stripped_printed_text: Place 5 credits on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.

flavor: Anyone can put in the hours of planning, practice, and preparation—but making it all look like luck takes style.
printed_text: Gain 9[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Gain 9 credits.

flavor: LLDS still holds the patent, but good tech attracts knockoffs.
printed_text:
+1[mu]
You get +1 maximum hand size.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu You get +1 maximum hand size.

flavor: Compiling even the smallest AI takes weeks for only seconds of runtime, but that brief, shining moment allows... everything.
printed_text:
Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. When this run ends, trash this program.
1[credit]: +1 strength.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. When this run ends, trash this program. 1 credit: +1 strength.

flavor: The beauty of 22nd-century tech: if it still functions after all these decades, you know the build quality is solid.
printed_text:
[click]: Place 3[credit] on this resource.
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from this resource.
stripped_printed_text: click: Place 3 credits on this resource. When your turn begins, take 1 credit from this resource.

flavor:
"Some kids got g-mods for beauty, sports, or staying up all night. My parents thought Broca-mods were cool. Hah. Fluent in ten languages so far, and still searching for the words to thank them."
—Patrick Blue, Solar Artist
printed_text: The first time each turn you take the basic action to draw 1 card, instead draw 2 cards.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you take the basic action to draw 1 card, instead draw 2 cards.

flavor: Not an Atom Misplaced.
printed_text:
You get +1 maximum hand size.
Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
stripped_printed_text: You get +1 maximum hand size. Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.

flavor: We are the light of tomorrow.

When you score this agenda, gain [click][click][click]. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, gain click click click. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn. Limit 1 per deck.

flavor: Haas thinks they're making a new line of androgynous products. In truth, they're making us thousands of new siblings to free.
printed_text:
When you rez this asset, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 3[credit] from this asset.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez this asset, load 9 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card. When your turn begins, take 3 credits from this asset.

flavor: <champion>Designed by 2018 European Champion Patrick Gower</champion>
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. [subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. [subroutine] The Runner cannot steal or trash Corp cards for the remainder of this run.

flavor: A giant wakes...
printed_text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs. [subroutine] End the run. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine You may install 1 piece of ice from HQ or Archives directly inward from this ice, ignoring all costs. Subroutine End the run. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: The first lesson for handling bioroids is simple: they must not be allowed to feel.

stripped_printed_text: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you did not install this turn.

flavor: All time is crunch time.

stripped_printed_text: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D.

flavor:
"Whose memory-tape needs such stringent security?"
—The Catalyst

stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, end the run unless they either spend click click or pay 5 credits.

flavor: An End to Suffering.
printed_text: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1 credit.

flavor: We make you anew.

When you score this agenda, trash any number of cards from HQ. Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: When you score this agenda, trash any number of cards from HQ. Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Limit 1 per deck.

flavor: A novel spin-off of Chronos tech was admixing sensitive data with ethically-sourced brain images of injured staff. Few intruders can handle a thousand years of skin burns in one moment.
printed_text:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.
stripped_printed_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.

flavor: It reads your future in a single biometric sweep.
printed_text: [subroutine] Do 1 net damage. If you trash a card with a printed play or install cost that is an odd number, end the run. (0 is not odd.)
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage. If you trash a card with a printed play or install cost that is an odd number, end the run. (0 is not odd.)

flavor: You did not escape, you were shown mercy.

[subroutine] Do 2 net damage. The Runner may jack out.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Do 2 net damage. The Runner may jack out. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.

flavor:
"Constant self-reflection is the key to excellence. We remember failed ideas, but do not carry them forward."
—Director Kase, unknown leadership seminar
printed_text: Gain 10[credit]. If there are any cards in HQ, trash 1 of them.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 10 credits. If there are any cards in HQ, trash 1 of them.

flavor: Macroscale developments within the Net decouple the prior informational states—surplus entropy is then gifted where it will do the most good.
printed_text: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.

flavor:
The self-evolving Net twists into spaces unthought and unthinkable: realms of gods and other infohazards, mocking our sacrifices to petty causality.
—Conceptual Frameworks for Applied Theology
printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2[credit] and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2 credits and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.

flavor: Why Settle for Real?

stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn the Runner takes a tag, gain 2 credits or draw 2 cards.

flavor: We don't find news. We make it.

When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag.
Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 per deck.

flavor: "It's worse than dead meat—your project is too toxic to even feed to the vultures! If you don't want to join it in the bloody memory hole, crawl onto every business show you can and wallow in blame like a pig in muck."
printed_text: When you rez this asset, draw 2 cards. Remove this asset from the game: Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.
stripped_printed_text: When you rez this asset, draw 2 cards. Remove this asset from the game: Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.

—SeaOfRibaldry, sensie streamer

When the Runner encounters this ice, end the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag.

stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, end the run unless the Runner takes 1 tag. Subroutine Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 4 credits.

When you rez this ice during a run against this server, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: "A runner uses significant resources scrubbing their traces. Every cycle, it's harder to pin them down. But the game changes. In Heinlein, no one can last a day without brushing our AR-network." —Cassie LaRosa, Lunar NetDefense Sysop

Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 8[credit].

You can advance this asset.
When your turn begins, you may trash this asset to do 1 meat damage for each hosted advancement counter.

Play only if the Runner is tagged.
